characters: Driver of a black SUV, driver of a gray sedan
summary: In this segment, the vehicle is driving on a busy urban road. The black SUV on the right side is moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane, potentially causing a cut-in. The gray sedan ahead is maintaining its lane but is relatively close to the self-driving vehicle.
actions: The self-driving vehicle is maintaining a steady speed while monitoring the black SUV on the right side, which is moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane. The vehicle is also keeping a safe distance from the gray sedan ahead.
key_objects: 1) Right side: A black SUV, approximately 2 meters away, moving closer to the self-driving vehicles lane, potentially causing a cut-in. 2) Front: A gray sedan, approximately 5 meters away, maintaining its lane but relatively close to the self-driving vehicle.
